greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Filter sequence for all such sequences b, for which b(A014580(k)) = constant for all k >= 3.
comment: Restricted growth sequence transform of A305900(A091203(n)).
This is GF(2)[X] analog of A305900.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..100000
Index entries for sequences operating on GF(2)[X]-polynomials
program: prepare_v091226(up_to) = { my(v = vector(up_to), c=0); for(i=1,up_to,c += A091225(i); v[i] = c); (v); }
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Jun 14 2018
